title: 2 Bedroom Apartment in Oranjezicht
description:
A light, bright, North-facing space overlooking the park and city centre with Table Mountain and Lions Head as a backdrop. Walking distance to Kloof Street and The Garden Centre.Access to this second-floor apartment is by stairwell or elevator. The building is secured with burglar proofing and CCTV cameras and a single, secure parking space is included.The focal point of this spacious apartment is the kitchen and living area which offer the views, the warm light and the social setting for a comfortable living experience. A passage leads back to two private, ensuite king size bedrooms as well as a separate laundry.This property is offered fully furnished for a long-term lease.Available immediately.
